mapper.select: SELECT MEM.MEM_ID memId , MEM.PLATFORM_CODE platformCode , MEM.NICKNAME nickname , DM.PASSWORD password , SM.SOCIAL_ID socialId FROM MEMBER MEM LEFT OUTER JOIN DEKER_MEMBER DM ON MEM.MEM_ID = DM.MEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SOCIAL_MEMBER SM ON MEM.MEM_ID = SM.MEM_ID WHERE ID = #{id} AND PLATFORM_CODE = #{platformCode} AND MEM.LAST_DT > '9999-12-30'
mapper.update: INSERT INTO ACCT_MAIL_CHECK ( ID , CHECK_STRING , UPDATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{checkString} , SYSDATE()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CHECK_STRING = #{checkString} , UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE()
